Text: The last word in the brackets is Wineskin.  This is my first torrent, and I wasn't aware there was a length limit.  I'll be seeding it like a nut!

I didn't know so many people would grab this so fast.  Sorry it's taking so long.  I don't have very fast upload speed; especially with so many downloading.  If you're one of the first to get a complete file, please keep seeding to help out others.
Let me know if there are any problems with the wineskin, and I'll do my best to help.
For me it's appearing on the dock as opened for a few seconds, than closes, I got a late '06 IMac and I'm still on 10.6 so it's probably just my computer, but I'd like to know if there's a fix

Does your imac support 1920x1080 resolution?  From what I see, only the 24 inch model from that year does.  The text file contains instructions for changing resolutions.  It will crash at startup otherwise.
I'm not sure whether or not 10.6 could affect it.  I should have mentioned that I used a 2012 imac with 10.8.3 to make it, and the other laptop I tested it on also had 10.8.
Why did u set the default to 1920x1080? I set all my mac ports to 1280x800 for compatibility reasons..

Yes, you're right. I should have.  This is the first time I've ever shared anything that I've done with anybody else though, and I was thinking that more people would want a higher resolution, and only the people that couldn't display it would have to go through the process of changing it.  I should have set it lower though.  Lesson learned.  Luckily, it isn't hard to change.
thanks pitch_mod for the well-picked game and explicit instructions. hope you continue to upload!
